products.name: Frame 01
products.desc: A large avaitor style frame with a keyhole bridge and wire crossbar. Featuring an acetate frame with antique white and clear tan tortoiseshell, high-polish gold metal hardware and burnt sienna lens with subtle magenta mirror finish.

products.desc: A large avaitor style frame with a keyhole bridge and wire crossbar. Featuring an acetate frame with antique white and tan tortoiseshell, high-polish silver metal hardware and yellow-amber lens.
